property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * FROM TBL_ACTIVITY_COUPON where 1=1 /~couponName: AND COUPON_NAME like '%'||{couponName,string}||'%'~/ /~couponType: AND COUPON_TYPE = {couponType,string}~/ /~couponStatus: AND COUPON_STATUS = {couponStatus,string}~/ /~createTimeStart: AND CREATE_TIME >= '[createTimeStart,timestamp]' ~/ /~createTimeEnd: AND CREATE_TIME <= '[createTimeEnd,timestamp]' ~/ /~checkedTimeStart: AND CHECKED_TIME >= '[checkedTimeStart,timestamp]' ~/ /~checkedTimeEnd: AND CHECKED_TIME <= '[checkedTimeEnd,timestamp]' ~/ ORDER BY ID DESC WITH UR

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * FROM TBL_ACTIVITY_RULE where 1=1 /~ruleCode: AND RULE_CODE like '%'||{ruleCode,string}||'%'~/ /~ruleName: AND RULE_NAME like '%'||{ruleName,string}||'%'~/ /~ruleStatus: AND RULE_STATUS = {ruleStatus,string}~/ ORDER BY ID DESC WITH UR

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT * FROM TBL_ACTIVITY_EVENT where 1=1 /~eventCode: AND EVENT_CODE like '%'||{eventCode,string}||'%'~/ /~eventName: AND EVENT_NAME like '%'||{eventName,string}||'%'~/ ORDER BY ID DESC WITH UR

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT A.ID,A.BATCH_GRANT_NAME, A.MEMBER_COUNT, A.MEMBER_COUNT*A.PER_GRANT_COUNT AS GRANT_COUNT, A.PER_GRANT_COUNT, B.COUPON_NAME, B.COUPON_TYPE, B.COUPON_AMOUNT*A.MEMBER_COUNT*A.PER_GRANT_COUNT AS COUNT_AMOUNT, A.CREATE_TIME, A.GRANT_STATUS, A.VERSION FROM ACTIVITY.TBL_ACTIVITY_GRANT_RECORD A,ACTIVITY.TBL_ACTIVITY_COUPON B WHERE 1=1 AND A.COUPON_ID=B.ID /~batchGrantName: AND BATCH_GRANT_NAME like '%'||{batchGrantName,string}||'%'~/ /~createTimeStart: AND A.CREATE_TIME >= '[createTimeStart,timestamp]' ~/ /~createTimeEnd: AND A.CREATE_TIME <= '[createTimeEnd,timestamp]' ~/ ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT A.ID, A.COUPON_COUNT, A.COUPON_USED_COUNT, A.MEMBER_NO, A.VALIDITY_TIME_START, A.VALIDITY_TIME_END, A.RULE_NAME, A.RULE_TYPE, B.COUPON_NAME, B.COUPON_STATUS FROM ACTIVITY.TBL_ACTIVITY_USERCOUPON A LEFT JOIN ACTIVITY.TBL_ACTIVITY_COUPON B ON A.COUPON_ID = B.ID WHERE 1 = 1 /~ruleId: AND A.RULE_ID = {ruleId,long}~/ /~memberNo: AND A.MEMBER_NO like '%'||{memberNo,string}||'%'~/ /~ruleType: AND A.RULE_TYPE = {ruleType,string}~/ ORDER BY A.ID DESC
